website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for a cheaper pogo stick with fun LED features should check out this flashy model.
pros: Sides of pogo jumper flash with LED lights at every jump
Built-in squeaker at bottom of pogo base
Cushioned base and foam-grip handles for child's safety
cons: Not the best option for smaller children
A few pogo jumpers arrived with defective lights

customer_reviews.title: Perfect passive-agressive gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old nephew for Christmas, and he loves it. Chose this gift for two reasons: 1) Looked like a fun toy, and I thought my nephew would enjoy it. 2) Pretty sure the squeaker in the base would drive my sister-in-law and her husband crazy. I was right on both counts.
customer_reviews.author: BleuEyeDevil

customer_reviews.title: This toy is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my four-year-old, but all my kids and I love using this. It is so easy to just step on and jump, plus it squeaks when u jump and it lights up beautiful with those LED'S . They use this in the house in the winter, it's just heavy duty coated foam....They all love it and smile and laugh along while jumping and squeaking !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just Received this 5 minutes ago...My 7yr old Daughter went to try it out and the bungee popped and broke before she even got to jump once....
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this, my son (5 years old) was excited for this. I thought it would great for indoor play when the weather didn’t permit outside play, burn off energy in a fun way. It was way too difficult, I even tried it and was only able to get in a few hops before tipping over. Maybe other kids can master it but for my son, who already struggles with confidence issues this was a huge fail. He ended up crying every time he tried it, I had to take it away eventually because it was causing too much stress. Will probably opt for a small trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Seeka Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value developmental toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge success with my 6and nearly 4 year olds. I chose this product to help strengthen several skills & muscle tone things we are working on with a pediatric physical therapist. This toy is not disappointing in sneaking practice into play. The foam block squeaks with each bounce (great sensory feedback). The LED lights...took us a little while to figure out. They turn on when the handle is dropped, rather than with bouncing, but still super fun for younger kids. Jumping skills, and using both feet together, along with core strength, ankle/foot strength, and sensory processing needs all being met with this toy. Excellent value for the price (especially compared to "therapy marketed" products).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This was a good value for the price & definitely buy it if you want one of these. The quality seems good, except one issue which I think could be the same for all makers of this, one of the handle lights quit working shortly after my kids started using this. If your kid has the attention span for this type of toy it's great. My kids like to try it but give up after a few minutes when the block flies away from under their feet. Fun fact, adults can use it too. lol I tried it. It's actually not a bad workout & my kids were cracking up watching me try it.
customer_reviews.author: C.Smith

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: When I got it for my 5-year-old I thought it would just give me an idea of whether she had the coordination and balance necessary for the real pogo stick she has been asking for all year. Santa did bring her a real pogo stick but she hasn't even tried to use it; she still loves her foam pogo bouncer so much! I didn't expect it to be so fun! The squeaky sound makes it really fun for kids. When friends come over to play, everybody takes turns in the foam pogo bouncer trying to see who can get the most consecutive bounces before having to put a foot on the floor to stabilize themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Pogo stick fun and keeps kids active!
customer_reviews.text: Well we bought 3, two for our boys and one to gift. The two we bought doesn’t really make the squeaky noise which I don’t mind at all. It is a great fun toy and easy to help maintain kids active during this quarantine time. It’s even great for adults to ease off the stress and exercise. I highly recommend it and the price was good. *Update* they’re quite the fun that we bought another one totaling 4. The last one we received does squeak and lights up. Kids have fun while being active. It’s a win win.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyinPink

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a whim and my toddler has so much fun jumping on it. It's nice that it squeaks because we use that to count how many jumps she can do in a row. The flashing light doesn't work that well since it just seems to go off randomly when the toy isn't being used but that's not a big deal. Overall it was definitely a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Just wOnderful

customer_reviews.title: No squeak!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think those reviews about the squeakiness are fake because this thing does not squeak! I got the first one and got a replacement because it didn't squeak then the replacement didn't squeak so I returned both and got a third and that didn't squeak either! Can't beat the price and it's a good jumpy thing to keep kids busy and active just don't expect squeaking. Honestly, I'm kinda jipping it with only 2 stars because it's a cool thing and it would have 5 stars if it squeaked!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Poor Durability
customer_reviews.text: I am a pediatric home health physical therapist, and I purchased this product for my autistic children who have problems with balance. One little girl was using the pogo stick, and the rubber cord snapped on her. She fell, but fortunately, she did not hurt herself. She was upset that she could not use the pogo stick anymore. I would down load a picture if I knew how to do it. Unfortunately, I am not computer wise. Take my word for it. I would not purchase this product. It breaks too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Annie

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever for my son with ADHD!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sooooo freaking cool! I bought it for my son (with ADHD) that needs to get his sillys out constantly. He said they also have them at school and he loves to play with it there. Ours doesn't squeak though which is probably a blessing is disguise actually because I didn't think he'd use it as much as he does. The lights work awesome. I had never seen these before but am so glad I found it! We've had it for a month now with no rips or tears. And that might be record timing for any toy my son gets his hands on.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: This toy is very cool in that it lights up when one jumps
customer_reviews.text: This toy is very cool in that it lights up when one jumps. However, the handle is flexible and that makes it very challenging for a 4 year old. I think he will love it when he is a bit older, but, at 4, it is tricky. Also, because it is tricky, I recommend starting in the grass for small children. It is very easy to fall off and wood floors are not good for that!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: According to my 3 year old granddaughter, who received this for Christmas, "I love it. I can go hoppy, hoppy, hoppy on it. It's lot's of fun." She had a little trouble with it at first, but soon mastered it. Both her mother and father tried it Christmas morning and everyone enjoyed watching, and laughing. I like that it is light weight and compact to stick in the car if you want to take a small "toy" with you. I sure she'll have many hours of fun with it, as well as her brother when he is old enough for it!
customer_reviews.author: CSH

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: This looked like it would be a lot of fun for my 5 year old. The rubber between the handle and foot piece is very flimsy, making it hard to actually jump on. The squeeky noise and lights when in use are fun. We ended up buying her a better quality pogo stick for just a few dollars more. Would not recommend buying, unless you do not mind it sitting in a toy box.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun and bouncy toy
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these, one for each of my boys (2 and almost 5). They LOVE them. It was one of their favorite Christmas gifts. I got these on a whim because I felt they were well priced and looked like something to help get their energy out when we're stuck inside this winter. I would definitely recommend. My 2 year old can't really hop more than once on it like the 5 year old but he still thinks it's fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this gift for my 5 year old nephew and all of the kids loved playing on it on Christmas. Children as young as 2 were able to use it as well as the adults. It does squeak when jumped on (like advertised), but I was happy to see that it wasn’t a very loud sound and therefor wasn’t annoying. I would recommend this for active children as a basement or outdoor toy.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but still a hit
customer_reviews.text: The squeaking was cute and my son loved it. The block is much softer than the flybar so my son liked that too, but one side of the handle was chipped and the light was out on that side. The other side still lit up so it was still a hit. There is no way to change batteries in light so once they go, that's it. Overall, son still loved it despite obvious defects
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Got two of them neither one squeaked
customer_reviews.text: I wish the ones I ordered squeaked. It looked nice and worked well but I ordered two of them and neither one squeaked and that was disappointing to my son. Unfortunately I'll have to go with a different brand. I say I ordered two because I sent one back for not squeaking and the next one also didn't squeak. The product didn't come with any kind of booklet either.
customer_reviews.author: Carrach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Indoor Sport for Active Kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my active 5 year old granddaughter. It's the perfect indoor activity. After a couple tries she had it mastered. We count the number of jumps (sneaking in a little additional learning) always trying to best her last score. Another fun game is to follow a list of "challenges", like "three jumps in place, then three jumps forward, then jump in a circle...." She's loving it!
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: 300lbs or less you can use this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for christmas on the fly. I had no ideas what it would actually look like when it got here. But christmas day he loved it. He still bouncing around the house on it. So are his older sisters. My husband and I have also used it. So in terms of Durability it's actually great. My son is 4, girls are 7 and 10. Most weight on this 260lbs so far has bounced on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Older Children!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really great product. However, it is definitely too difficult to maneuver correctly for my little guy. Not yet 4 years old and in size 5T, it still requires more "skill" than he is capable of. That being said, my 10 year olds love it, even if they aren't the ones with sensory needs... so I highly recommend this for bigger children but I'd go with something easier for a young child.
customer_reviews.author: NRFS

customer_reviews.title: Great toy to keep the kids active and excited
customer_reviews.text: Cool back yard toy for toddlers and kids . Very light so it comes with us to parks and picnics and the kids just love it
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Our 2-year old grandson is going on 4 and is very active. We decided to get an active toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 3 yr old! She has no problem lining up and crushing the ball. Really like how many plastic hollow balls came with this set. Bat is hollow as well but it's great confidence buster because she sees the results going far out. Just wish the stand was a little sturdier but I just put a small sandbag on the base.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Chesser

customer_reviews.title: LED light is not motion activated as advertised - you have to squeeze the LED light to activate it
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this Click n' Play Foam Pogo Jumper, as the light that is advertised as motion activated and is in the ends of the handles, actually is located within a yellow rubber bulb that sticks off the top center of the handle and requires it be squeezed to activate the LED. It's somewhat difficult to activate it and it doesn't last long once activated. This appears to be the newer version of this item, as I purchased it December 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B.

customer_reviews.title: Great item except lights might be defective:(
customer_reviews.text: LIghts only worked on one of them . I bought two kids really enjoy them except for the fact that one is defective and causes constant drama over who get the one with the lights on it . I own a family childcare and bought this for outdoor and indoor gross motor skills and new ways to move and have fun. If one wasn’t defective I would have rated this toy a full 5 star item.
customer_reviews.author: corinna

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly fun and easy-to-learn toy!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked how quickly our child learned how to use this pogo jumper. It’s well made and very sturdy when being jumped on. It is important for the child to pull up on the handle when they stand on it for balance, but once they understand this they love it! I see no reason why this pogo jumper won’t last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 48 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these, one for our 4 year old grandson, and one for our 6 year old daughter. Both enjoyed it a lot, but our daughter's broke the day after Christmas. Our 13 year old daughter was using it. She is ~ 95#, and 5 feet tall. The product description reads "It can accommodate children of all sizes and supports up to 250 pounds, meaning it’s just as enjoyable for parents..." I can't see the rubber handle supporting parents at all. Returning the broken one and hoping for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth L.

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this. Initially bought for my 3 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. Initially bought for my 3 year old as a birthday gift, but her 5 year old sister seems to get more entertainment out of it. Either way it’s a win! Lights work and squeaky worked too. I would recommend! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy for even adults
customer_reviews.text: These were Easter gifts. The kids and adults enjoyed them. The only thing that could be a negative is the "been there done that". Once they played with them they moved on to other things. But then again that's kids these days! There was lots of laughter involved.
customer_reviews.author: Tbrow

customer_reviews.title: The best sub $20 gift ever
customer_reviews.text: This pogo jumper works too well and it is difficult to convince my daughter to let go. She will use it instead of walking which drives me crazy and makes her very happy. As the latter was the purpose, I declare this a success. The fact that it still survives after such a massive use is a proof that this is made to last
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift. Seemed to be a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Seemed to be a little tougher for a child to play with them I expected. Probably will end up piled up with other toys not played with. It is basically what it says though.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great little jumping toy and bonus lights
customer_reviews.text: These are for my granddaughters for Christmas! I know they will have hours of fun jumping on these and they light up too so that's a little something extra! I can't wait to see them jumping on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great for active kiddos
customer_reviews.text: (Wish I had this as a kid instead of a pogo stick.) Easy to use with a bit of practice. Safer than a pogo stick and less frightening. Lights, sound, bounce, all work great! Kids love it, adults love it. Kids and adults can use it too. Gets them off the couch and is great indoor exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Fell short of what was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The Led lights did not work and the squeaking never happen....I tried and still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Shermaine

customer_reviews.title: Foam pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old daughter saw it in a store and wanted one. I thought it would break once a 12 year old started using it, but it has not torn or broken in any way after multiple uses since buying it in December and it is now February. She is entertained even though it is suppose to be for toddlers and it keeps her moving in the basement during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Our little excersize at home
customer_reviews.text: Since we got this, we have all been using it as our warm up excersize. It's great for kids and adults. It makes a non irritating squeak sound but is not annoying. The foot portion is so sturdy squishy and is a great tool to learn how to balance. Oh and it lights up. Super clever.
customer_reviews.author: Tehmine Yalbuzdag

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift, but unpacked it and examined it before hand due to other reviews. I pulled on it and have it some good tugs. This seems fun and sturdy and should keep a 6 year old busy indoors and out.
customer_reviews.author: .dita.

customer_reviews.title: Not a pogo and has no springs or anything.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a pogo and has no spring or jump to it. Your child stands on a foam block holding it by the handle qnd jumps around using their own leg power. Pretty lame but much safer than a pogo
customer_reviews.author: Shppnfool

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: description says fun for the whole family and they weren't kidding. bought this for 5 year old grandson and it seems everyone from 3 years old to 33 years old are having fun with this. Its for the KIDS people!!! lol. grandkids love it. they say its pretty sturdy. they play with it outside as well as inside. lot of fun for not much money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy to get kids up & moving. My 7 & 8 yr olds love it. My 3 yr old has tried but can't do it. Bungie cord is really short which would be my only complaint. I tried doing it but was hard being so low.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lance

customer_reviews.title: Great for inside play, even with older kids!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 8, and has been begging for one of these. I thought it would be too young for him, but he loved it! He’s played with it more than any of his other Christmas toys! It’s perfect for playing inside in the winter, when kids need hands on play.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good for wearing out kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 3 yo grandson. He is learning to use it but 5, 6, 7 year olds picked up the technique rigt away. Seems very sturdy but not sure how long flashing handle lights will last with no way to replace batteries. Supports up to 240 lbs and a few adults tried it too. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: docgobbler

customer_reviews.title: Kids 3 and 6yrs loved it
customer_reviews.text: They both 3/6yrs old jumped right on and could use it with no practice or balance. It squeaks when they jump and lights up on the handle and they thought they were awesome!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: This was the hit of Christmas for our 4 year old grandson. He has been bouncing all over the house since opening it. He’s really good at it, too. So glad we found this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Active Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is meant to hold up to 250lbs, my husband jumped on it and he's able 180lbs and the handle broke off from the part you jump on-- he was able to fix it. Ours doesn't squeek--never did out of the box. I actually wish it did, because I'm sure it would hold my kid's attentions better. Other then those two things I think it's a cool too that my kids will get some use out of--they need some practice at it, which is fine, a good you for them to be active and to work on their balance. My kids are 2 and 4.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Fit Beauty

customer_reviews.title: BEST HOLIDAY GIFT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them! The three years old to my own kids that are 8 and 11. They hold up to 250lbs and the kids bounce around on them all day. Gets some energy and way fun.
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: Fun for balance
customer_reviews.text: It's a little short for my 4yr old, but she's tall. She can still use it but it's hard to do. The noise it makes when you successfully jump really is a cute feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loves this! It doesn’t squeak for him because he’s not heavy enough to compress it to make the squeak. But when his daddy used it, it squeaked! Lol. Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lanne Milne

customer_reviews.title: This item is not what it appears to be in photo.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 5 year old. The handle appears to be a post but it is just a rope and not sturdy making it too difficult for a young child to operate. It was hard even for adults to try. It may be better suited for a work out apparatus.
customer_reviews.author: Marijan

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it today.. it seems sturdy.. at first I was a little hesitant to buy, but it's actually a very nice product.. I myself had some fun jumbing with it..
customer_reviews.author: Vini

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our grandchildren for Christmas. It is really easy to jump on and I can envision them having fun with these this winter when it's too messy outside to play. FYI the squeaker can be eliminated by poking a sharp object into the ends of the foam. One of our grands is sensitive to noise so we "desqueaked " hers.
customer_reviews.author: Tworiverrats

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Grandkids like it. Bought on lightning deal so great price. I bought 2 one for my house and one for theirs. Ages that are using it with no problem is 4-8 and a dad that tried it too. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Pogo jumper for a three-year-old son and our 8 year old daughter they both absolutely love it they have been bouncing inside and outside non-stop since they received their package from Amazon Mom even gave it a try and had a blast I highly recommend this toy
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: No sqeaky sound and rope disconnected by just pulling it slightly
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 sets but neither has sqeaky sound which defeat the purpose. Just when I tried to figure out why there's no sound, the rope got disconnected from the foam. Super disappointed. Going to return and look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. CHIEN

customer_reviews.title: Annnoying but kids love
customer_reviews.text: All my kids ended up loving this so much, even though it was a gift for my 7 year old. Even my 60 year old dad had to try it haha but the squeaky thing in the bottom every time they jump drives me insane, it’s so loud. The kids love it and think it’s hilarious to watch mom go nuts, even the dog runs away in fear. Overall good purchase for a cheap toy
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: Challenging work out even for Adults!
customer_reviews.text: I tied a rubber exercise band to the handle to extend the length to suit a 5'7" adult, this way it can be used for jumping work out as recommended by doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Neracat

customer_reviews.title: The kids 6 and under loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and fun! The noises it makes my drive the parents crazy, but as the grandmother who gave it—it was so much fun seeing the littles enjoy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this.
customer_reviews.text: Have 5 granddaughters, the 6 year old, the 5 year old twins and the 4 year old love this! Best gift ever!!! The 18 mo. Old will enjoy later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts when I purchased this but it was actually the best all around Christmas toy. It has held up to much use and my 4 year old granddaughter hops all over the house with this. Her 2 year old brother can’t quite manage yet but it won’t be long and I’ll be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: dbest57

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor kids workout!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVE THIS!! She use to play with a similar one during her preschool years. Now with covid-19 outside, this came to be the best indoor workout MACHINE!!!
customer_reviews.author: To the point.

customer_reviews.title: Energy sucker :)
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loves this! She is 3 and I thought maybe a traditional pogo stick is too hard for her yet. I love that when she used this, she also uses up a lot of energy!
customer_reviews.author: makapala

customer_reviews.title: too short,not suitable for over 6 years old
customer_reviews.text: everything is fine ,but is too short for my son ,my son is 7,it said itcan hold 250lb,but too short for my boy 。but he say just keep it ,maybe next year it cant use any more
customer_reviews.author: yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Kids were sad...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two as gifts. Neither squeaks at all.. super disappointed. Kids were upset... ruined the surprise. Do not buy!!! Jumps fine but zero sound.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Led didn't work
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, gave this as a gift and the led light didn't work. The kids did like it though and it was funny to see the adults try
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so much fun, for all ages. My 2.5 doesn’t quite know how to jump on it , but she try’s and has fun making it squeak. My oldest loves it, and will jump all day! Very good quality, and seems like it will last a long long time!
customer_reviews.author: Hdaniellle

customer_reviews.title: Great fun indoor or out.
customer_reviews.text: Just gave it to my 7 yr old grandson and he was an instant pro. It's good indoor or out. I like it because it's sturdy enough for even me to try. (He is much better!) Well made, seems sturdy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy F.

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Fun! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Just enough fun for my 3 boys! I love it and so do they! I gave it 4 out 5 stars bc I'm unsure as to the durability of this product. So I will try and update in a few months after some serious use and let you all know! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Perez

customer_reviews.title: 3 and 4 year old love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for grandson's 3rd birthday. Mom says he loves it and asked me to buy another for granddaughter so they'll each have one! She said she could due without the squeaker!
customer_reviews.author: Candie

customer_reviews.title: Jump around, jump around
customer_reviews.text: It squeaks, it lights up, it keeps my busy 5 year old, well, busy. Small enough to store just about anywhere and not too difficult to master, it's provided a whole lot of outdoor play. To keep him busy I tell him to count his jumps and write them in chalk each round. Brilliant, inexpensive, win.
customer_reviews.author: Melaina Lara

customer_reviews.title: What a fun toy for such a good price
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this! A lot! What a fun toy for such a good price. My husband and i both jumped on it too when she asked. He is 6'1 and 300lbs and it worked for him and didn't smash or stretch or damage it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. Great fun.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 and 1\2 year old great niece for Christmas. I don't know who had more fun, her, her parents or her grandparents. The whole family got involved and we even ordered another one on Christmas Day.
customer_reviews.author: speeder reader

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVES!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson turned 7 right before Christmas and this was one of his Christmas gifts... I would say it has been his favorite by far. He jumps all over the house and has a great time with it. The only complaint we have is the squeaking drives us nuts after a while. lol I would recommend highly though, he has had so much fun with it. Very easy for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Monk

customer_reviews.title: No LED lights!
customer_reviews.text: Came with black handle, obviously no LED lights in handle. Incorrect information.
customer_reviews.author: E5937

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: Present for my 5yo granddaughter. She loves it. So does the other kids, 8 yo girls and 9 yo boy. Even the 1yo tries to get in on the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tracyp

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchildren. They love these pogo jumpers! Many hours of fun! Perfect size, and built. Win!
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Moses

customer_reviews.title: but it’s just stretchy like thick rubber bands so it’s hard for my child ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to master. From the pictures it appeared to have some rigidity so that it could stand up on its own, but it’s just stretchy like thick rubber bands so it’s hard for my child to use. She’s still having fun with trying to use it though.
customer_reviews.author: spellbqueen

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: All my kids love playing on this, from 4-10 years old. I've even jumped on it a few times. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: The husband, kids and grandkids have had a blast jumping on it. Seems to be holding up to a lot jumping so far.
customer_reviews.author: Snowyk

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyment
customer_reviews.text: The birthday boy really enjoyed it and so did the others at the party. It seemed sturdy enough and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: My almost four year old granddaughter loves her pogo jumper. It just took a little bit of time getting used to using it. Once she mastered the pogo, she had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Joni B. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loved it and once his brother figured it out he ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 for my 2 young boys aged 2 and 4. My 4 year old loved it and once his brother figured it out he did too. Its harder then a regular pogo stick as the handle isn't stiff to hold up the handle but it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Ambereyez

customer_reviews.title: Great Sensory Toy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for kids with Seeking Sensory Processing Disorder. My son is a seeker and using this toy before school helps him get the input he needs to focus at school. Also, the size is great, my son is almost 9 and uses this with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Pettigrew

customer_reviews.title: No lights in handle, false advertising!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised with lights in the handle. It even has it all over the box that it had LED lights in the handle. When you open the box... nope no lights. I can tell you I had a very disappointed little girl who jumped on it in every way possible trying to figure out why it wasn’t lighting up. We Live in a rural area that makes it hard to do returns especially for this price bracket, I do believe that they do this intentionally, which makes it even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Schlotman

customer_reviews.title: NOT for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for our son’s 3rd bday. I was very disappointed as y have to be strong enough to pull the elastic up so it’s tight, in order to jump. Definitely not a good gift for a toddler! But, his 11yo brother loved it 👍
customer_reviews.author: Tekabonika

customer_reviews.title: Little kids love it, parents hate it.
customer_reviews.text: Got for a nephew, he loved it. My sister had the squeaky part pulled out within 5 minutes of him playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Really durable!
customer_reviews.text: It has lasted through 2 grandsons. They are 2 & 4 yrs old. They love jumping around in this. It’s really fun for them to learn better balance from this pogo jumper.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri L.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: It's flimsy, I thought it was an actual sturdy cord but it's just a flimsy wire and the foot stand is tiny. Bought two for my twins, it was an epic fail.
customer_reviews.author: Makassa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My little 5 year old granddaughter's last 15 minutes, before it broke...I tried to fix it...but it's impossible....Not worth the money....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but lights don't work.
customer_reviews.text: 4.5 stars. Four and 11 year olds enjoy it, can't wait to get their turn. But the LED lights don't work.
customer_reviews.author: RockyFan

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for all ages! My 4 and 5 year old grands loved this on Christmas morn. It took 5-10 minutes to learn, but then they were having contests of who could jump the farthest.
customer_reviews.author: J K. Rick

customer_reviews.title: Fun durable toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy brings joy and fun play for the Grandkids! Builds skill, balance and coordination. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. The squeaker is an added bonus. We use outside, so it's not that annoying. If you are going to use inside, the squeaker may be too much. The lightup part is the best for outside in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: R. McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. She's 6. Has already improved her balance. The first time she lasted about 10 seconds, now she's bouncing all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: cheply made
customer_reviews.text: my grandson is 4yr old he got it and jumped one time and the handle came off
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Please Be Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for twins. They love them! At the birthday party even the adults got into the action. The only issue is on one the LED light worked and on the other one it does not. You need to do better quality control. Otherwise 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, simple, active toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy is fun - my 4 year old granddaughter got it going quickly and also liked the squeak and the lights. It is safer and easier to use than a regular pogo stick. You wouldn't want to scrape up the foam so inside use or a flat grass area would be best. We all tried it and it does work for adults. This would be great to use for a race or an outside obstacle/relay course if you had 2.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little pogo jumper! Great entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 3 yr old grandson. Even the adults were having fun with it! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Huggins

customer_reviews.title: nice indoor "get your energy out" activity
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves this. the light on the top is a nice feature i overlooked. It lights up when you jump on it. like a pogo stick but less dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product at such a low price! Bought in December of 2018 and it's sept. 2019! Still works perfectly, even for my weight of 200 l B's!
customer_reviews.author: KimiSum!

product_meta.title: Click n' Play Foam Pogo Jumper - Makes Squeaky Sounds with Flashes LED Lights
product_meta.description: The Click n' Play Foam Pogo Jumper is a fun and exciting toy for teaching children basic yet necessary physical skills like hand-to-eye coordination and dexterity. It also encourages an active and healthy lifestyle through play by strengthening core muscles. It can accommodate children of all sizes and supports up to 250 pounds, meaning it’s just as enjoyable for parents who want hopping fun of their own! With comfortable handles and a soft, cushiony base, your child can safely use our Pogo Jumper indoors and outdoors. It won’t even leave scuff marks on surfaces like hardwood floors!
feature_bullets: Super fun and safe Foam Pogo Jumper is great for kids and adults with 250 lbs weight limit
Side handles features flashing LED lights which gets activated when jumping
Makes squeaky sounds with every hop
With comfortable handles and a soft, cushiony base, your child can safely use our Pogo Jumper indoors and outdoors. It won't even leave scuff marks on surfaces like hardwood floors!
Stretchable cords encourages an active and healthy lifestyle through play by strengthening core muscles.
